流石: (sasuga) - como se esperava; mesmo assim, de qualquer forma
流石に: (さすがに) - as one would expect; still/all the same
流石は: (さすがは) - as one would expect

流行: (りゅうこう) - fashion/fad/vogue/craze; prevalence (e.g. of a disease)

流行の粋: (りゅうこうのすい) - the cream (pink) of fashion
流行らす: (はやらす) - to popularize; to give currency to; to set a trend
流行らせる: (はやらせる) - to popularize; to give currency to; to set a trend
流行り: (はやり) - fashion/fad/vogue/craze; prevalence (e.g. of a disease)

流行り廃り: (はやりすたり) - changes in fashion

流行り言葉: (はやりことば) - buzzword; popular expression; vogue word or phrase
流行る: (はやる) - to be popular/to come into fashion; to be prevalent/to spread widely (e.g. disease)/to be endemic; to flourish/to thrive

流行性感冒: (りゅうこうせいかんぼう) - influenza; flu

流行目: (はやりめ) - conjunctivitis; pink eye; epidemic keratoconjunctivitis

流行言葉: (はやりことば) - buzzword; popular expression; vogue word or phrase
